=Create New Theme=

All the themes that come with the release are placed under [http://java-syntax-highlighter.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/syntaxhighlighter/theme/package-summary.html syntaxhighligther.theme] package. All themes should extends the [http://java-syntax-highlighter.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/syntaxhighlight/Theme.html syntaxhighlight.Theme] class. You can take a look at [http://code.google.com/p/java-syntax-highlighter/source/browse/trunk/src/syntaxhighlighter/theme/ThemeDefault.java syntaxhighlighter.theme.ThemeDefault] to see what should be done to make a new theme.
